diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Mitochondrial Encephalomyopathy, Lactic Acidosis, and Stroke-like episodes (MELAS)
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Vasculitis, Atrial myxoma, Cardioembolic phenomena, Alport syndrome, Other genetic diseases (such as Fabry disease)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the patient's clinical history of multiple infarcts, hearing loss, diabetes mellitus, cardiac disease, and short stature, along with elevated serum lactate levels. Genetic testing confirmed the m.3243A.G mutation associated with MELAS, fulfilling clinical diagnostic criteria.
